snippet: Taking on new debt won’t solve the deep fiscal problems plaguing New York cities and towns. It will just make things worse.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Syracuse Mayor Stephanie A Miner criticizes New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo's proposed state budget for failing to address fiscal pressures faced by many of state's cities; calls on Cuomo to use his substantial political capital to convene Legislature, state comptroller, and union and business leaders for honest conversation about deep fiscal problems plaguing state's cities.
lead_paragraph: Taking on new debt won’t solve the deep fiscal problems plaguing New York cities and towns. It will just make things worse.

headline.seo: New York State’s Cities Can’t Borrow Their Way to Solvency
